thread.title: Justin Bieber India 'Purpose Tour' opening ticket sale sets new benchmark!
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber India 'Purpose Tour' opening ticket sale sets new benchmark!

author: ANI
title: Justin Bieber India 'Purpose Tour' opening ticket sale sets new benchmark!
text:
Justin Bieber (Photo: AP) New Delhi: Looks like, Justin Bieber India 'Purpose Tour', brought to the country by White Fox India, is setting new benchmarks and raising the bar in the live entertainment industry.
With more than 50,000 people waiting in the queue, when ticket booking counters opened on February 22, at 12 noon, the event received the most phenomenal opening response.
Arjun Jain, the director at White Fox India, and the brainchild behind the event states, "We have received a phenomenal response to the ticket sales and it has also taken the international management by surprise. To clarify to the audience, the tickets priced at 76,790 INR are the ones which are being overseen by Justin Bieber's management personally. These tickets give the holders an exclusive backstage tour, featuring a sneak peak of what happens behind-the-scenes and what it takes to create the Purpose World Tour, invitation to the Purpose VIP Lounge, a premium merchandise package created exclusively for the them, and one exclusive commemorative laminate."
He adds, "From the very beginning, we have strived to maintain our aim of keeping the event as accessible and economical as possible, since it's a once in a lifetime opportunity for avid music lovers, especially our very own Beliebers! This maybe the first and last time that Justin Bieber visits India to perform and we would like to give every single music lover an unparallel experience and make it worth their every penny."
The announcement of 'Purpose Tour' in India has created hysteria amongst the fans and concert tickets across categories have been selling faster than hot cakes.
In fact, many of the categories experienced a 100 percent buy-out within 24 hours!
Maximum entries have been received from Mumbai, Delhi, Hyderabad, Ahmedabad, Shillong and Chandigarh. This concert is not only putting India on the world map, but also bringing the people of India together, under one roof.
The show is scheduled to be held on May 10, 2017 at DY Patil Stadium. Concert goers can look forward to a set that will surely comprise worldwide smash hits including- 'Where Are Ãœ Now,' 'Boyfriend,' 'Love Yourself,' 'Company,' 'As Long As You Love Me,' 'What Do You Mean?,' 'Baby,' 'Purpose,' 'Sorry' amongst others.
Touring in support of his fourth studio album, 'Purpose,' which debuted at #1 in over 100 countries and has sold over eight million copies worldwide, Bieber is one of the most successful pop stars in the world today, with a recent world tour imbibing sold out dates across countries.
